text: Can anyone tell me how to resize the reCAPTCHA icon on forms? The default is super big.

Hi All,
We're looking to create a custom object by creating a new schema on the CRM custom objects page for the developer resource. We are receiving an error code called "Invalid primary display property: my_object_property" (screenshot attached). We can't figure out what this is relating back to. Does anybody have experience with this or know what might be causing this?
Thanks
